name: Sue Johnson
text: Always clean and quiet dining room. Food is fresh, hot, and delicious. Missing the salad bar, but glad inside dining is back. Sherri is our favorite reason to eat there. She is excellent, very attentive, and anticipates the needs of the customer.

text: Extremely slow delivery and cheese on pizza tastes very cheap. Delivery driver was late delivering pizza. Wouldn't recommend this pizza hut to anyone. By far worst pizza hut i ever dealt with

text: Pizza Hut has the best pan pizzas and they always have good deals! I've never had to wait long for a delivery and their carryout is always ready on time and fresh!
